title: Need help ultra emergency riot gms please look at this

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I am currently in a bit of a sad predicament where I am 12 orange essence short of experiencing the full effect of the new pre season with BOOLING nasus help a brother out please. I even drew a nice picture for you :) :) :) :) :)     {{champion:75}}  = Happy if he archduke{{item:3681}}
